TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Where do you see a waiter? It's a Robomatix Coffee-shop. Only robots are serving.

Peasant! That cabbage and a turnip, please!

One kohlrabi coming right up.

Waiter, there's a [ERROR 502: BAD GATEWAY] in my forums!

Just use the proper gateway where other guests come in. You don't need to open every back door in the kitchen.

Jar Jar! Give me that jar!

Check the door, I believe it is ajar.

Waiter, some soup to celebrate the upcoming 5000.

Are you going to drop 1 000 of the coming 6 000?

Gardener! Apple, iPlease.

I will send an Android down to the market garden to fetch one for you.

Waiter, it is the end of the soup as I know it, but I feel fine.

Don't worry, the main course is just done.

Waiter, where is my super-soup?

Sorry but Superman ate it.

Waiter, some jokers soup please.

Our cook has gathered all jokers for his Caravan hand.

Bartender! Roll the save throw, I 'm going to drink this.

Save roll successful, you accidentally knock over the drink and watch as it burns through the table.

Waiter, what is this "Strange Meat"?

That's the point, you don't know what it is until it goes in the suspicious stew.

Hey waiter! Why is a black hole eating MY soup?

We call that your mouth, hmm, when is  the last time you saw a dentist?

Waiter, a Tourine of soup please.

Sorry, taurine is an unhealthy hormone to ingest

Waiter, an antimatter fusion bomb with my soup, please!

Your order doesn't matter. It's antimatter.

Bar. Dear wooden bar. Only you understand me.

Wunderbar

Wonder Soup?

Sorry, sir. It's prohibited by the state law.

Herbalist! Your herbs are so... loudy.

It is because we grow them to the song "Welcome to the Jungle" by "Guns and Roses".

Waiter, some Good Gateway soup please.

Kraken ate it all. We should wait it for being prepared.

Barbeing! What is this purple jelly with floating yellow eyes in it?

That is a customer, please do not eat our customers.

Waiter. a soup made from my tears please.

Your cut onion, sir.

Bartender! Pint o'borane, please. My lovely green fairy.

I warned you against eating the "Mysterious Stew".

Waiter, what is on the menu?

Your phone. Take it off, please.

Phone! Ring!

Soup ring. Need you to go out the back and do the washup.

Waiter, some Saturn ring soup please.

Here's some Sarnus Ring Soup instead. Sorry if it tastes bad, it's only 10% as good as Saturn Ring Soup.

Hey waiter, i ordered Haumea soup, not Mesklin soup!

Hau we can, so we meake it. Eat it, and be happy it doesn't smell ammonia.

Ammonite! Ammonia soup, please!
